page.title: 06DOUNE "MY ROOM"
page.content: "Our house was built in 1897. It is a little bit small; when you are in the kitchen it gets a bit crowded." Alisdair "My house is a very big, old house. It has lots of sheds used for pheasants. My dad has to look after 500 pheasants every summer". Deanne "The people who lived in my house before us kept cows in the kitchen". Geoff "We have quite a few posters up in our bedroom mainly of WHAM!" Laura "Under my window is a heater and in winter I will sit beside it and read or listen to music". David "My little brother's bedroom wallpaper has mice and rabbits with fat stomachs sleeping in wine glasses with the words 'Go to sleep' on top". John-Paul
